DELETE.ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure that you want to delete '{label}'? This action cannot be undone.

WARNINGS.DUPLICATE_ID: A bonus with that identifier already exists!
WARNINGS.MISSING_TARGET: You must designate where the bonus should apply!
WARNINGS.MISSING_ITEM_TYPES: You must select at least one item type!
WARNINGS.MISSING_ABILITY_TYPES: You must select at least one ability!
WARNINGS.MISSING_FILTER: Your bonus needs at least one filter!

TITLES.IDENTIFIERS: Identifying information of the bonus. The label is for your convenience, while the identifier is used to refer to the bonus by effects.
TITLES.TARGETS: What the bonus should apply to.
TITLES.DESCRIPTION: A description of the bonus for your convenience.
TITLES.ITEM_TYPES: The types of items the bonus should apply to.
TITLES.SAVE_BONUS: An integer to add onto the DC of a saving throw.
TITLES.ATTACK_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the attack roll.
TITLES.DAMAGE_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the damage roll.
TITLES.DAMAGE_CRIT: An additional number of dice that should be rolled on a critical hit, and additional parts to add on top of the damage roll, only on critical hits.
TITLES.THROW_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the saving throw.
TITLES.CHECK_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the ability check.
TITLES.HITDIE_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the hit die roll.
TITLES.INIT_BONUS: Additional parts to add on top of the initiative roll.
TITLES.ARBITRARY_COMPARISON: Insert numbers or rollData properties that must be in this relationship for the bonus to apply.
TITLES.ITEM_SPECIFIC: Whether the bonus from this item should require being equipped or attuned to apply to the actor

KEY.ITEM_TYPES_DESC: Select any item type that this bonus should apply to. You must select at least one.
KEY.ABILITIES_DESC: Select the ability score that is used by the item. This filter respects spellcasting abilities, finesse weapons, and default values.
KEY.SAVE_ABILITIES_DESC: Select the ability score that is used by the item to set the saving throw's DC. This filter respects spellcasting abilities.
KEY.ATTACK_TYPES_DESC: Select the types of attacks the bonus should apply to. Leaving it empty will apply the bonus to all attacks.
KEY.DAMAGE_TYPES_DESC: Select a damage type. If the item has a formula with at least one of the selected damage types, the bonus will apply.
KEY.COMPONENTS_DESC: Select any spell component that the item must have. You can choose whether the spell must have all or at least one of the selected options.
KEY.SPELL_LEVELS_DESC: Select the spell levels that the bonus should apply to. This is the level at which the spell was cast, not the base level.
KEY.SPELL_SCHOOLS_DESC: Select the spell schools that the spell must be a member of.
KEY.ACTOR_CONDITIONS_DESC: Select the status conditions that the actor must be afflicted by. The bonus will apply if the actor is afflicted by at least one of the selected conditions.
KEY.TARGET_CONDITIONS_DESC: Select the status conditions that the target actor must be afflicted by. The bonus will apply if the target actor is afflicted by at least one of the selected conditions.
KEY.WEAPONS_DESC: Select the type of weapons that the bonus should apply to.
KEY.PROPERTIES_DESC: Select weapon properties that should be required for the weapon (the bonus will apply if the weapon has at least one of them) or any properties that must not appear on the weapon.

TRAITS.NAME: Build-a-Bonus Workshop
TRAITS.HINT: Open the Build-a-Bonus workshop. Here you can create very niche bonuses that apply when you use an item with a saving throw (increasing or decreasing the DC), when you roll an attack roll (adding modifiers on top), or roll damage (adding modifiers on top, a well as critical dice and critical damage).
TRAITS.LABEL: Build-a-Bonus Workshop

DISPLAY_LABEL.NAME: Display Label
DISPLAY_LABEL.HINT: If checked, the label is displayed in the header of applicable items and effects.
